Description: TCP/IP SystemVerilog SHUNT An example of API functions-Initiator(server)

This example demonstrates how to use the SHUNT API functions from the server (initiator) side to establish communication channels and perform various data type transfers including vectors of integers, doubles, and strings in a loopback testing environment.
